March 10, 1990 D Midlands (North) Area (Championship Section)
Midlands (North) Area (Championship Section) 100 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area north-midlands-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)

Championship
The Beacons
Royal Concert Hall, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, UK Thoresby and Rhodian qualified for the finals along with William Davis. Desford were excluded from the Finals line-up having completed a Hat-Trick in 1989. Information taken from contest programme and British Bandsman 4561
